CategoryMessage.Topic: How do I recover my username and password?
CategoryMessage.Message: To recover your username and/or password, please call the toll free number: 1-800-999-1009 for U.S. inquiries and 1-888-946-6329 for Canadian inquiries. There is also a “Forgot Password?” link on the Log In screen to reset your password.

CategoryMessage.Topic: How do I update my HondaLink™ personal information?
CategoryMessage.Message: To update your HondaLink personal information, please call the toll free number: 1-800-999-1009 for U.S. inquiries and 1-888-946-6329 for Canadian inquiries.
